meta_description: This is one of the most important properties of a Meta Info as it is used to
Only lowercase roman letters, numbers and underscore are allowed.
The prefixes t\_, u\_, \_, x\_ are reserved for temporary, user defined, non
standard, and code specific Meta Info respectively.
Explicit names are preferred to abbreviations, and the name should always
